name: v1.0.0
body:
## MODULE.bazel

```starlark
bazel_dep(name = "toolchains_riscv_gnu", version = "1.0.0")

# Toolchains: riscv-none-elf
riscv_toolchain = use_extension("@toolchains_riscv_gnu//:extensions.bzl", "riscv_toolchain")
riscv_toolchain.riscv_none_elf()
use_repo(riscv_toolchain, "riscv_none_elf")

register_toolchains("@riscv_none_elf//toolchain:all")
```

## WORKSPACE

```starlark
load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive")
http_archive(
    name = "rules_cc",
    sha256 = "2037875b9a4456dce4a79d112a8ae885bbc4aad968e6587dca6e64f3a0900cdf",
    strip_prefix = "rules_cc-0.0.9",
    urls = ["https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_cc/releases/download/0.0.9/rules_cc-0.0.9.tar.gz"],
)

load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:git.bzl", "git_repository")
git_repository(
    name = "toolchains_riscv_gnu",
    remote = "https://github.com/hexdae/toolchains_riscv_gnu",
    tag = "v1.0.0",
)

load("@toolchains_riscv_gnu//:deps.bzl", "riscv_none_elf_deps")
riscv_none_elf_deps()
register_toolchains("@riscv_none_elf//toolchain:all")
```



## What's Changed
* [TOOLCHAIN] use aliased repos by @hexdae in https://github.com/hexdae/toolchains_riscv_gnu/pull/18
* [VERSION] provide max archive default by @hexdae in https://github.com/hexdae/toolchains_riscv_gnu/pull/19


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/hexdae/toolchains_riscv_gnu/compare/v0.0.2...v1.0.0

name: v0.0.2
body:
## MODULE.bazel

```starlark
bazel_dep(name = "toolchains_riscv_gnu", version = "0.0.2")

# Toolchains: riscv-none-elf
riscv_toolchain = use_extension("@toolchains_riscv_gnu//:extensions.bzl", "riscv_toolchain")
riscv_toolchain.riscv_none_elf(version = "13.2.1")
use_repo(
    riscv_toolchain,
    "riscv_none_elf",
    "riscv_none_elf_darwin_arm64",
    "riscv_none_elf_darwin_x86_64",
    "riscv_none_elf_linux_aarch64",
    "riscv_none_elf_linux_x86_64",
    "riscv_none_elf_windows_x86_64",
)

register_toolchains("@riscv_none_elf//toolchain:all")
```

## WORKSPACE

```starlark
load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive")
http_archive(
    name = "rules_cc",
    sha256 = "2037875b9a4456dce4a79d112a8ae885bbc4aad968e6587dca6e64f3a0900cdf",
    strip_prefix = "rules_cc-0.0.9",
    urls = ["https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_cc/releases/download/0.0.9/rules_cc-0.0.9.tar.gz"],
)

load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:git.bzl", "git_repository")
git_repository(
    name = "toolchains_riscv_gnu",
    remote = "https://github.com/hexdae/toolchains_riscv_gnu",
    tag = "v0.0.2",
)

load("@toolchains_riscv_gnu//:deps.bzl", "riscv_none_elf_deps")
riscv_none_elf_deps()
register_toolchains("@riscv_none_elf//toolchain:all")
```



## What's Changed
* [BCR] better pre-release by @hexdae in https://github.com/hexdae/toolchains_riscv_gnu/pull/17


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/hexdae/toolchains_riscv_gnu/compare/v0.0.1...v0.0.2

name: v0.0.1
body:
## MODULE.bazel

```starlark
bazel_dep(name = "toolchains_riscv_gnu", version = "0.0.1")

# Toolchains: riscv-none-elf
riscv_toolchain = use_extension("@toolchains_riscv_gnu//:extensions.bzl", "riscv_toolchain")
riscv_toolchain.riscv_none_elf(version = "13.2.1")
use_repo(
    riscv_toolchain,
    "riscv_none_elf",
    "riscv_none_elf_darwin_arm64",
    "riscv_none_elf_darwin_x86_64",
    "riscv_none_elf_linux_aarch64",
    "riscv_none_elf_linux_x86_64",
    "riscv_none_elf_windows_x86_64",
)

register_toolchains("@riscv_none_elf//toolchain:all")
```

## WORKSPACE

```starlark
load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive")
http_archive(
    name = "rules_cc",
    sha256 = "2037875b9a4456dce4a79d112a8ae885bbc4aad968e6587dca6e64f3a0900cdf",
    strip_prefix = "rules_cc-0.0.9",
    urls = ["https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_cc/releases/download/0.0.9/rules_cc-0.0.9.tar.gz"],
)

load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:git.bzl", "git_repository")
git_repository(
    name = "toolchains_riscv_gnu",
    remote = "https://github.com/hexdae/toolchains_riscv_gnu",
    tag = "v0.0.1",
)

load("@toolchains_riscv_gnu//:deps.bzl", "riscv_none_elf_deps")
riscv_none_elf_deps()
register_toolchains("@riscv_none_elf//toolchain:all")
```



## What's Changed
* [CI] fix GitHub actions by @hexdae in https://github.com/hexdae/toolchains_riscv_gnu/pull/1
* [WINDOWS] fix compilation by @hexdae in https://github.com/hexdae/toolchains_riscv_gnu/pull/2
* [GCC] support remote execution by @hexdae in https://github.com/hexdae/toolchains_riscv_gnu/pull/3
* [GITHUB] separate remote execution flow by @hexdae in https://github.com/hexdae/toolchains_riscv_gnu/pull/4
* [GCC] Extra flags feature by @hexdae in https://github.com/hexdae/toolchains_riscv_gnu/pull/5
* [GGC] register toolchains independently by @hexdae in https://github.com/hexdae/toolchains_riscv_gnu/pull/6
* [EXAMPLES] add workspaces by @hexdae in https://github.com/hexdae/toolchains_riscv_gnu/pull/9
* [TOOLCHAIN] simpler host management by @hexdae in https://github.com/hexdae/toolchains_riscv_gnu/pull/8
* [GCC] add readelf by @hexdae in https://github.com/hexdae/toolchains_riscv_gnu/pull/10
* [RISCV] gdb by @hexdae in https://github.com/hexdae/toolchains_riscv_gnu/pull/11
* [BAZEL] bazel seven support by @hexdae in https://github.com/hexdae/toolchains_riscv_gnu/pull/12
* [BAZEL] module support by @hexdae in https://github.com/hexdae/toolchains_riscv_gnu/pull/13
* [CI] enable by @hexdae in https://github.com/hexdae/toolchains_riscv_gnu/pull/14
* [RELEASE] update notes by @hexdae in https://github.com/hexdae/toolchains_riscv_gnu/pull/15
* [RELEASE] v0.0.1 by @hexdae in https://github.com/hexdae/toolchains_riscv_gnu/pull/16


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/hexdae/toolchains_riscv_gnu/commits/v0.0.1
